revised_title: Hyperfine Structure in the Arc Spectrum of Xenon: Part II
tldr: This study investigates the hyperfine structures of the lines in the visible and photographic infrared spectrum of xenon-129 and xenon-131. The researchers measured these structures again, mainly in the course of measurements of the isotope shifts in this spectrum. They used an improved experimental method and analyzed enriched isotopes to provide revised and new values of hyperfine structures and hyperfine structure constants for the levels of xenon.
